name: CommandLine
description: Kaholo plugin for executing cmd/shell commands.

params.name: workingDir
params.description: The path in which the command will be executed from.

params.name: COMMANDS
params.description: The command(s) to execute. When entering multiple commands, separate each with a new line. They will be executed sequentially regardless if the previous command was successfully executed. If command runs interactively, add flag (-y) to avoid timeout errors.

params.name: finishSignal
params.description: Waiting until the operation is completed before moving on to the next operation. Default is Exit.

params.name: shell
params.description: For linux specifies whether to use bin/sh or bin/bash as the shell. For windows only default cmd.exe is available.

params.name: sshKey
params.description: Key to authenticate to remote server using SSH. You can either take the key from the Vault here, or you can use the Private Key Path parameter.

params.name: KEY_PATH
params.description: The path of the key to use to authenticate with to remote server using SSH. You can either specify a file path here or use the Private Key parameter to take it from the Vault.

params.name: REMOTE_USER
params.description: The SSH username used to authenticate to the remote host.

params.name: REMOTE_ADDRESS
params.description: The URL of the host to execute the command on.

params.name: port
params.description: The port used to connect with SSH to the remote host.

params.name: COMMANDS
params.description: The command(s) to execute on the remote host.

params.name: numberOfTime
params.description: Number of times to execute the command.

params.name: workingDirectory
params.description: If specified, execute the command from the specified directory.
